reviews.review: Different match every time, fun to master. You will learn how to accept less than perfection in a game and still have a ton of fun playing. Been playing for 3 years and its still fun, would recommend.

this sucks. i cant even add my xbox account to the dead by daylight game. i do not recommend this game for people who played on a different platform other than pc because you cannot link your device onto the game.

It has been a decent experience to be played with friends, most notably via voice chat on Discord application. As a horror fan myself, this game has attained a balance between the element of horror and the clarity of surrounding environments, prompting this game to be one of the best epitome of horror genre video game. Therefore, in gremio, it is recommendable to purchase this if you are horror fan and possess an affinity towards the excitement arising from being chased and from chasing others within a horror environment.
Great game, fun and simple but yet complex to  master.
I saved a survivor, and another blocked me with a pallet, then proceeded to sandbag me in the same pallet, i died because of that instead of a 4 man escape :) 10/10
Fun game! Amazing to stream as well! Balancing issues are a problem but it can be oki

Dead by Daylight can be a great game but it can also be an absolute ass game. It all depends on who you play with as this game has an extremely toxic community. Especially on the survivor side. It is extremely tiring to deal with gen rushers, flashlight stunning, and butthurt trolls who get angry over a mori, collectively make this game cancerous.
As for the killers, the tunnelers and campers make this game extremely boring and unfun.

If you play with chill people who don't make their existence out to annoy you though, this game can be extremely fun.

This is a very fun game to play! You can also play with friends as well. Wouldn't recommend to people who don't like gore. This game is very gorey but I am perfectly fine with it and still find it very fun. If you want to get your heart beating a little bit, I recommend playing this! If you don't have a good enough computer you can always turn down the graphics. They graphics quality at low still look very good! Very good game, I recommend playing fully.
Buen game, divertido, la comunidad es ultratoxica pero bueno como todo juego online.
removes brain cells rapidly the more you play

I've had this game for a super long time, and its still one of my favorite games!:) There is so much fun in this game, especially with all the DLC coming into the game, gathering EVEN more new players. Recently, I got it here on my PC and played with my friend (who he is new to the game) and he enjoys it alot:) Highly Recommend. -Jeremy

If you like unbalanced bull**** and hate yourself please  go ahead and buy this game.

Pros:
1. Killer can be fun as they are all unique
2. Can be fun with friends.

Cons:
1. Game was not designed with teams with comms so balance is out the window. Solo queue as a survivor is terrible.
2. Toxic af community,  if you're playing killer expect every survivor to wait for you at the exit and teabag or accuse you of camping/tunnelling
3. It's also grindy af.  You need millions upon millions of bloodboints at a time and you only get 10-30k per match without any Bloodpoint increasing offerings.
4. Devs don't seem to play their own game.  

Edit: I wrote the previous in the heat of the moment after a series of bad games. Even though I've calmed down, I still can't recommend this game to new people, mainly for its grindiness and bad matchmaking.  It can be a lot of fun when matchmaking WORKS, but that is only half the time maybe. Oh and half the perks you get are terrible, with only a dozen or so being viable on both Killer and Survivor side.
Fun, a bit grindy, but can be played casually as well.
pretty good game on its own but a pretty bad community
Great fun, always find myself coming back to it again and again.

Good game! It has got a lot of technic to it for both sides (killer and survivor).

I would note it's not a "pick up and go" type of game - maybe at the lower levels its more forgiving but the better you get, the harder the killers get.
